name: Hungarian Chemical Industry Association
membership: Member of the European Chemical Industry Council (CEFIC) and the European Chemical Employers Group (ECEG).
goal: MAVESZ is a trade association representing the professional interests of enterprises operating in the chemical sector in Hungary, promotes cooperation among its members, follows both domestic and international developments in the production, commercial and economic trends of the chemical industry, and provides information on them to its members. MAVESZ is also a sector level employers' organization and a participant of the Chemical Industry Social Dialogue Commitee in Hungary.
interests: Business and Industry, Climate Action, Competition, Economy, finance and the euro, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, Taxation
